verbs.description: [ARG0: Stephen Miller] [V: has] [ARG1: a long history of controversy] , and he has become a key policy driver in the Trump White House , playing a major role in government shutdown negotiations and enacting the controversial " zero tolerance " policy of separating migrant parents from their children .
